moves.name: Sticky Web
moves.description: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stat upon switching into battle.

moves.name: Withdraw
moves.description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: Constrict
moves.description: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. It may also lower the target's Speed stat.

moves.name: Bide
moves.description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

moves.name: Rollout
moves.description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

moves.name: Encore
moves.description: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.

moves.name: Wrap
moves.description: A long body or vines are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

moves.name: Struggle Bug
moves.description: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets' Sp. Atk stat is reduced.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.

moves.name: Rest
moves.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user's HP and heals any status problem.

moves.name: Rock Throw
moves.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

moves.name: Gastro Acid
moves.description: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.

moves.name: Power Trick
moves.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack with its Defense stat.

moves.name: Shell Smash
moves.description: The user breaks its shell, lowering its Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raising Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

moves.name: Rock Slide
moves.description: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing team to inflict damage. It may also make the targets flinch.

moves.name: Bug Bite
moves.description: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

moves.name: Power Split
moves.description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target's.

moves.name: Guard Split
moves.description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of its target's.

moves.name: Stone Edge
moves.description: The user stabs the foe with sharpened stones from below. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

moves.name: Sticky Web
moves.description: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stat upon switching into battle.
